input.sentences: our vacation was great this year
there was so much old architecture
all of the road ways are cobble stone
we found this funny looking cat in one of the store windows
output.sentences: The town had a lot of old Swiss architecture.
The town tried to keep with its roots.
There were a few houses that stood out.
The cobble streets are not good to wear heels on.
We saw a cute cat in the window.
